wikipedia_page.main: Roger W. Mills (born 13 February 1951, Guildford, Surrey, UK) is a British economist working in the area of corporate finance. Emeritus professor at Henley Business School University of Reading, the Group chairman at Value Focus Group, a group of consulting firms, Chief Instructor and Chairman of the British Shito Ryu Karate Association (BSKA), 8th Dan (Kyoshi).

response: * Roger W. Mills – Emeritus Professor of Finance, University of Reading
